property.name: Rules
property.value: Blocker Triple Breaker Blockade - Whenever this creature enters the battle zone, and whenever it attacks, you may draw a card. Then you may put a non-evolution creature that is level 9 or less and has "Blocker" from your hand into the battle zone. Aurora Armor - This creature can't be the target of your opponent's spells and abilities. Light Monarch - Each of your other Light creatures gets +4000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double Breaker Forecast - At the start of each of your turns, look at the top card of your deck. You may put that card on the bottom of your deck. Waterspout - Whenever you cast a spell, you may return target creature that is the same level as that spell from the battle zone to its owner hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Triple Breaker Gaze into the Abyss - When this creature enters the battle zone, you may put the top 3 cards of your deck into your discard pile. For each Darkness card put into your discard pile this way, your opponent chooses one of his or her creatures in the battle zone. Banish those creatures. Reanimate - Whenever this creature attacks, choose a creature in your discard pile and return it to your hand. Darkness Monarch - Each of your other Darkness creatures gets +4000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double Breaker Rekindle - Whenever this creature wins a battle, you may discard your hand. If you do, draw 5 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double Breaker Abundant Growth - At the start of each of your turns, you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This card enters your mana zone tapped.) Blocker Double Breaker Immobilize - When this creature enters the battle zone, tap target enemy creature. That creature doesn't untap at the start of your opponent's next tun. Impale - Whenever you cast a spell, banish target tapped enemy creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This card enters your mana zone tapped.) Fast Attack Powerful Attack +4000 Double Breaker Armor of Dawn - At the end of each of your turns, if this creature is tapped, you may put the top card of your deck into your shield zone face down as a new shield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This card enters your mana zone tapped.) Double Breaker Fast Attack Heatwave - All your other creatures have "Fast Attack." Overheat - At the end of each of your turns, choose one of your creatures in the battle zone and return it to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This card enters your mana zone tapped.) Double Breaker Transform Essence - Whenever this creature or one of your other creatures is banished, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a non-evolution creature, put it into the battle zone. If it's not, put it into your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This card enters you mana zone tapped.) Double Breaker Essence Siphon - When this creature enters the battle zone, put all creatures from your discard pile into your mana zone tapped. Soul Shackle - Whenever this creature attacks, you may choose a creature in your mana zone that is level 6 or less and put it into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap target enemy creature. It doesn't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your Enforcers. Double Breaker Pulse Wave - When this creature enters the battle zone and whenever it attacks, tap target enemy creature. (If this creature attacks, first choose what it's attacking, then tap the target creature.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one: ● Put a creature nameed Eternal Haven from your hand into the battle zone. ● Draw a card. Then you may put a non-evolution creature that is level 7 or less and has "Blocker" from your hand into the battle zone.

property.value: Double Breaker Omega Pulse - This creature wins all its battles.

property.value: Blocker Skirmisher Wingman - When this creature enters the battle zone, you may put a creature named Replicator Patrol from your hand into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shield Blast Tap target enemy creature. If you have 2 or fewer shields, put the top card of your deck into your shield zone face down as a new shield.

property.value: Blocker Skirmisher Bold Defense - Whenever this creature blocks, it gets +2000 power until the end of the turn.

property.value: Blocker Guard Frontline Recon - When this creature enters the battle zone, you may draw a card. Liquid Armor - If this creature would be banished, return it to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ditto - Whenever your opponent casts a spell, search your deck. You may take a creature named Cyber Scamp from your deck and put that creature into the battle zone. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shield Blast Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Put one of them into your hand, one on top of your deck, and one on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double Breaker Data Nexus - When a creature enters the battle zone you may draw a card. Regeneration Chamber - Each time one of your other creatures would be banished, return it to your hand instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Portal Hop - This creature can't be blocked. Trailblaze - Whenever this creature attacks, choose one of your other creatures. It can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the end of this turn, count the number of tapped creatures you have in the battle zone and draw that many cards.

property.value: Double Breaker Shattering Scream - When this creature enters the battle zone, banish target enemy creature that is level 4 or less. Then choose one of your opponent's shields. This creature breaks that shield.

property.value: Blocker Guard Needle Claws - Whenever this creature blocks, target enemy creature gets -2000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is banished.)
